channel.title: Door Troubles

item.title: Door Troubles
item.dc:creator: @Mmm1 Mmm.
item.description:
@Mmm1 wrote:

Well, I was making all the doors in Varrock work and was having fun until I got to the doors with the IDs 1533 and 1534. Whenever I try to open one they leave behind a weird post:

(I know the door was messed up in that picture, I didn’t take the time to fix it lol.)

Even if I try to remove the object twice that lame post remains there. Here’s the two codes I’ve tried:

if(objectX == 3230 && objectY == 3397) {
ReplaceObject(objectX,objectY,objectID, -4);
ReplaceObject(objectX,objectY+1,1534, -2);
}

That resembles codes I use for almost every door and they’ve always worked until this ID.

if(objectX == 3230 && objectY == 3397) {
ReplaceObject(objectX,objectY,objectID, -4);
ReplaceObject(objectX,objectY+1,1534, -2);
ReplaceObject(objectX,objectY,objectID, -4);
}

That’s the code I tried to use so that the post also gets deleted, but it didn’t.

Any advice?

Read full topic
